title: Instructional Design Strategies to Improve the Effectiveness of Secondary Computer Science Education [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational computer science theory and programming experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based learning modules in BYOD settings with real-time feedback via formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the instructional design process according to the ADDIE model phases by applying it to real-world cases.
Learners can derive at least three evaluation metrics when designing educational activities to enhance computational thinking.
Learners can develop and apply at least two effective formative assessment tools in a mobile microlearning environment.

resources: Mobile App Development Platform Access Rights

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
